channel.title: Cant connect
channel.description: when I try connecting it just says: Connection Rufused: Connect

item.title: Cant connect
item.dc:creator: @noobs_are_ftw noobs are ftw
item.description:
@noobs_are_ftw wrote:

[quote=“LilXCj, post:11, topic:395171”][quote author=noobs are ftw link=topic=492362.msg3600211#msg3600211 date=1305487702]

ok, umm well i just tried it again and it said i was banned… wtf?

You griefed my house.

what do you mean?

you went to his house and broke his hard work so i rolled you back and banned you

I thought you could do that… people always talk about doing raids on other people

Raids = stealing stuff. Not destroying it.

…shit, sorry guys, sorry reyx7… I honestly didnt mean to break any rules and if I could have another chnce I would be more then grateful, im new to minecraft and I love it. I’m not telling you to give me another chance but I would appreciate and you have my word I wont breaka nyones work.

ill unban you in 2 weeks and one grief and your banned for life
[/quote]

That’s a harsh policy. I ban for three days and wait for people to PM me to unban them.[/quote]

lol im a harsh person theres the harsh mods and the nice mods you know good cop bad cop

Read full topic
